title: Lung Detox Ayurvedic Tablets
description: Improves lung functions & reduces damage from smoking & pollution. Improves overall Lung Health and Immunity. Helps reduce congestion & ease breathing. Lung Detox Ayurvedic Tablets.
cleaned_text: Supports healthy lung functions - Reduces lung damage from pollution, smoking, and cough. - Cleanses lungs from toxins, tar, and mucus. - Enhances lung immunity, reducing infections - Improves lung functions for better oxygen absorption. - Helps you breathe easy & smoothly - Aids in reducing chronic cold and cough symptoms. Breathe easy with tar-free, healthy lungs, lifelong.
